hero.title: Create Cinematic AI Videos with seedancetwo
hero.description:
Generate high-quality videos from text or images with multi-shot storytelling and synchronized audio.
Build scenes faster with natural motion, flexible ratios, and creator-ready output.
hero.tip: Text-to-video and image-to-video in one workflow.

introduce.title: What is seedancetwo?
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: seedancetwo is an AI video generation experience inspired by Seedance-style workflows, helping teams turn prompts and images into cinematic clips quickly.

items.title: Multi-shot storytelling
items.description: Generate coherent multi-scene videos with consistent characters and visual style from a single prompt.

items.title: Text to video generation
items.description: Describe a scene in natural language and produce cinematic clips with smooth motion and lighting.

items.title: Image to video control
items.description: Upload a reference image and animate it into short videos while preserving composition and tone.

items.title: Fast creator workflow
items.description: Iterate quickly with reusable prompts and practical defaults for social, product, and marketing content.

benefits.title: Why teams choose seedancetwo
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Built for creators and product teams that need high-quality short-form videos with reliable output speed.

items.title: Consistent multi-scene results
items.description: Maintain visual continuity across scene transitions for stronger storytelling and less post-editing.

items.title: Audio-aware generation
items.description: Support synchronized dialogue and sound cues so generated clips feel more polished and production-ready.

items.title: Flexible output formats
items.description: Produce videos in multiple aspect ratios for social feeds, ads, landing pages, and short campaigns.

features.title: Core capabilities
features.description: Everything needed for a practical first-pass AI video generation workflow.

items.title: Text-to-video
items.description: Convert detailed prompts into cinematic clips with camera motion, subject behavior, and scene transitions.

items.title: Image-to-video
items.description: Turn still images into dynamic video sequences while preserving key visual composition cues.

items.title: Multi-shot narrative continuity
items.description: Generate connected shots that keep style and character consistency across the full sequence.

items.title: Cinematic quality output
items.description: Target high-quality exports suitable for social, marketing, and concept demonstration workflows.

items.title: Prompt-level motion control
items.description: Guide pacing, camera intent, and visual focus directly through prompt strategy and shot framing.

items.title: Fast iteration loop
items.description: Refine ideas quickly with repeatable parameters and simple controls for teams and solo creators.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Need help planning your first version? Contact us by email.

items.question: What is seedancetwo?
items.answer: seedancetwo is a Seedance-inspired AI video experience for creating cinematic clips from text or image inputs.

items.question: Does it support both text and image inputs?
items.answer: Yes. You can start from a prompt for text-to-video or upload a still image for image-to-video generation.

items.question: Can it create multi-scene videos?
items.answer: Yes. The workflow is designed for multi-shot storytelling so one generation can include coherent scene changes.

items.question: Is audio synchronization supported?
items.answer: The product direction supports synchronized audio and lip-sync style output for more natural video results.

items.question: What formats can I export?
items.answer: You can generate assets for common use cases such as landscape, portrait, and square workflows.

items.question: How can I get support?
items.answer: Email us at support@seedancetwo.com for setup and customization questions.

cta.title: Launch your first seedancetwo experience
cta.description: Start from this quick bootstrap and shape it into your own cinematic AI video product.
